mapper.update: update p_package set image=#{image} where packId=#{packId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from p_package where status=#{status} and station in (select s.id from p_station s where s.areaId like #{areaId}"%")

select p.id id,p.packId packId,p.receiverPhone receiverPhone,p.station station, p.shelf shelf , e.expressName expressCompany from p_package p,p_express e where p.receiverPhone=#{mobile} and p.expressCompany=e.e_id and p.status=1

select p.id id,p.packId packId,p.receiverPhone receiverPhone,p.station station, p.shelf shelf , e.expressName expressCompany, p.putInTime putInTime from p_package p,p_express e where p.station=#{stationId} and p.expressCompany=e.e_id and p.status=1
select image from p_package where packId=#{packId}
select p.id id,p.packId packId,p.receiverPhone receiverPhone,p.station station, p.shelf shelf , e.expressName expressCompany from p_package p,p_express e where p.expressCompany=e.e_id

select DATE_FORMAT(putInTime,'%H') as time, -- sum(case when station=1 then 1 else 0 end) as "驿站1", '%H:%i:%s' -- sum(case when station=2 then 1 else 0 end) as "驿站2", count(*) as value from p_package where putInTime between DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') and station=#{stationId} group by time order by time;
